item.title: Phulbari coal, power crisis, and a dangerous revisionism
item.description: Regarding the Phulbari Open-Pit Coal Mining Project, the chief adviser's press secretary recently made a Facebook post suggesting that Bangladesh is facing a severe power crisis because coal at Phulbari was not extracted.

item.title: Bauls, ballots, and the price of weak institutions
item.description: The surest sign of a liberal democracy is not a flag, nor a constitution framed behind glass. It is the quiet competence of institutions—and the political culture that keeps them honest. One shapes the other the way a river shapes its banks, and the banks, in turn, discipline the river.

item.title: Home adviser must retract his comment
item.description: His order to police to arrest without charge is deeply problematic.
